errorNoInternetConnection.message: Need internet connection to load articles.
errorNoInternetConnection.description: Displayed when RSS content cannot be displayed because of no internet connection. Take into account that internet connection is not always need to load RSS feeds.

errorCannotLoadFeeds.message: Could not load RSS feed (Did you enter wrong url?).

errorRssFeedEmpty.message: No articles in this RSS feed.

optionsScreenTitle.message: Chrome RSS feed screen saver options
optionsScreenTitle.description: Title displayed on top of options page.

googleNewsNameTop.description: This is the option we select to use google news - top news feed.

googleNewsInfixesTop.description: This is what we need to put to google news url (http://news.google.com/news?ned=[here we put us]&topic=[here we put h]&output=rss), top make google news display local top news.

googleNewsNameWorld.description: This is the option we select to use google news - world news feed.

googleNewsInfixesWorld.description: Look at the example for google top news.

googleNewsNameSciTech.description: This is the option we select to use google news - sci/teach news feed.

googleNewsInfixesSciTech.description: Look at the example for google top news.

rssSourceExample1.description: Rss feed source. Please find relevant local example or rss feed.

rssSourceExample1URL.description: Paste URL for the rss feed for above example here.

rssSourceExample2.description: Rss feed source. Please find relevant local example or rss feed.

rssSourceExample2URL.description: Paste URL for the rss feed for above example here.
